meanings.definition: A water sport in which a person rides a short, buoyant board on a wave.
meanings.sent1: Bodyboarding is a fun activity to do at the beach.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy bodyboarding during the summer months.
meanings.sent3: The seagull watched in amusement as the kids tried bodyboarding for the first time.
meanings.sent4: Her bodyboarding skills were as smooth as a dolphin gliding through the water.
meanings.sent5: The sound of waves crashing added to the thrill of bodyboarding.

meanings.definition: The act of riding a bodyboard.
meanings.sent1: I practiced bodyboarding for hours to improve my technique.
meanings.sent2: Bodyboarding requires balance and skill to stay on the board.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked puzzled as it observed the human bodyboarding in the pool.
meanings.sent4: Her bodyboarding performance was like a graceful dance on the water.
meanings.sent5: The sun setting on the horizon created a beautiful backdrop for bodyboarding.

meanings.definition: A bodyboard used in the sport of bodyboarding.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new bodyboarding for my upcoming beach trip.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of bodyboards to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The dog mistook the bodyboard for a giant chew toy.
meanings.sent4: The bright colors of the bodyboard stood out against the blue ocean.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed against the bodyboard, creating a thrilling ride for the surfer.
